website_summaries.verdict: A premium construction site radio with a digital tuner for unparalleled reception accuracy.
pros: Compatible with iPod and MP3 devices
Aluminum speakers built to perform in high winds, rain, sleet, and other severe weather
Can be plugged in wall outlet or used in conjunction with a power drill battery
Terrific sound quality compared to similar radios
cons: Can be hard to program memory channels

customer_reviews.title: Husbands New Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: I WANT SO BADLY to hate this radio but it comes with us on every job because it has earned it's space in the work vehicle. It is perfect for my husband, as it appears indestructible and such a workhorse. It screams out "I will survive the brutality of this job site" while sending classic notes of music for everyone to enjoy. With a heavy heart I have to give it 5 stars because as much I don't like sharing space in an already overcrowded work vehicle this beast earns his keep and gets come along to provide tunes.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great compact radio!
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for years and it finally died. Can't blame the radio. I used it in all environments and in the salty air. So when it died, I bought another one exactly like it. Good reception and easy to plug in your cell phone to play your own media.
customer_reviews.author: Bordazall Gedout

customer_reviews.title: Great radio, just what you expect from a Milwaukee.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the item today. My first impressions is this will be a great radio for me. In other reviews people don’t like the big ac adapter. I will probably never use the ac adapted so it is not an issue. Great reception to stations 70 miles away. This radio is also built like a tank. So far I am very happy that I bought this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have outside, somewhat difficult to set up memory channels, but overall it's typical Milwaukee quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hines

customer_reviews.title: love my little radio
customer_reviews.text: love this little radio. Purchased it to bring along when I ice fish. Its light and water proof. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good signal and loud
customer_reviews.text: This radio is really awesome. It gets a really good signal and I like how it can be plugged in or use a rechargeable drill battery. It also is extremely loud for its size.
customer_reviews.author: mountainman90562

customer_reviews.title: It has great sound, it's compact
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this radio. It has great sound, it's compact, and it's very durable. One thing, the compartment that hold the smartphone won't fit anything larger than a small iphone, so most Android devices unless they are really small will not fit. Because of this, the compartment door eventually fell off of my husband's. He doesn't mind so much, but thought I'd mention that for other people considering this item.
customer_reviews.author: Zillyzil

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: I can't change ipod song by pushing arrow. i bought solely 4 i pod, iPod connection broken.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Love this radio
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio. Very compact and durable. Not only do I take it on construction sites but my other job too .
customer_reviews.author: john kruse

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 9 months...I’d like to return
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months the radio won’t get any stations. I’d like to know the warranty process for this radio?
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Volts
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, like all radios just watch the antenna from falling off
customer_reviews.author: Richard Forte

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave it in the rain.
customer_reviews.text: These are usually great radios but one night in the rain and it is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Love it, wish compartment was 1/4" taller.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is great. Great sound and weight. On a full charge I get about 4-5 hours of music, when volume is about 95% the whole time. I have a Samsung Galaxy Player S4 (not phone, just Android MP3 Player) It is only about 1/4" too tall to fit in the compartment after plugging the 90 degree 3.5mm adapter in. I think I will get a dremel tool and bore out a hole for the 3.5mm jack plug to fit in so I can shut the door.
customer_reviews.author: CTMNicholas

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST RADIOS I HAVE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST RADIOS I HAVE EVER OWNED. ONE OF THE ONLY RADIOS THAT STILL RECEIVES "AM" STATIONS CLEARLY. I HAVE 2 OF THESE RADIOS NOW.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Powers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Short life and manufactor will not make it right.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good, but only lasted about two years. Warranty was up and millwaukee wanted to charge 70$ to fix the problem. Will not buy another millwaukee radio. I know three people that had millwaukee radios and they all failed. Not worth wasting your money on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A great radio from a great company. I highly recommend this radio. It works great for me on every jobsite, and has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound
customer_reviews.text: So far so good Wish I could have found the larger one.... with Rockford fozgate speakers....
customer_reviews.author: Medic

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee M12 Radio
customer_reviews.text: I just received this radio, and I must say it is smaller in size than I had expected, but it sure has a large sound. Very good in reception, with great digital channel separation, and I like the fact that the bass and treble can be independently adjusted. Very good quality sound from such a small package. I am very pleased with the purchase and the product, and as an engineer, I find the quality of workmanship, the attention to detail and quality of the sound very acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Part Time Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. He uses it on the daily at work.
customer_reviews.author: otxcshiwzis

customer_reviews.title: There is definitely better radios for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not good for out doors. Doesnt get loud enough for the job site. I now keep it in the shop for back ground noise, I get maybe 4 hours out of the battery
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This Milwaukee radio is cool! It is small and compact
customer_reviews.text: This Milwaukee radio is cool! It is small and compact, and easy to carry around to my job sites.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Likens

customer_reviews.title: I love this radio so much I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio so much I bought a second one. I would recommend this to anyone that does a lot of work outside. It is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Regina B.

customer_reviews.title: Built tough.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for job sites and tough handling. Built to last
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a deployment and it saved our lives. Battery lasted for many hours and it sounds great! Now I use it outside while I grill.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio! If you have to have volume enough to make your ears bleed then this isn't it. This unit is perfect for anybody doing work in private housing or apt.remods where sound can become an issue. The AC/CD cnverter is just one more thing to carry in/out so unless the job is going to last awhile crack a little more leather and buy an extra battery. You can always use it as a spare. I am an M12 compact driver and worklight owner.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good old fashioned radio. Digital, good reception. No Bluetooth to wear battery down. Good thing
customer_reviews.author: J. Gronke

customer_reviews.title: Mine was just stolen but I liked it enough to order another one right away
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for over a year. Mine was just stolen but I liked it enough to order another one right away. The sound quality is good and it works good enough to bring to my job in construction.
customer_reviews.author: butterbcny

customer_reviews.title: Below Milwaukee standards
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get very good reception and doesn't have good volume either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: M-12 Radio
customer_reviews.text: Excellent radio!! Great sound for a small radio. Sounds like a boom box. Great bass and volume!!
customer_reviews.author: STEVE BOOZER

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee rocks on.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and portable smaller then there are others. Has enough sound for the job site. The auxiliary for iPhone works good.
customer_reviews.author: D. KAILEY

customer_reviews.title: awsome sound
customer_reviews.text: this little Milwaukee radio puts out some great music that can fill your whole room...... with the adjustable bass and truble i use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: mejo

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: The radio is exactly what I hoped! Sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Bought this item for  Christmas present in 2011 and it has already stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought this item for Christmas in 2011 and it has already stopped working. I don't see any information on contacting the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Riley

customer_reviews.title: was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a birthday gift and my Grandson, was very happy with it. He takes it to work every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this unit everyday and is tickled to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Oldsong

customer_reviews.title: Very clear sound
customer_reviews.text: Radio is excellent and picks up more stations that the other one we were using. Would be a plus if it included the battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome even bought 1 as a gift. extra capacity battery will last full work day
customer_reviews.author: PipeAndWire

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. The water resistant compartment for phone or ...
customer_reviews.text: The radio is a compact, rugged little beast. Great sound. The water resistant compartment for phone or MP3 player is nice. Tested with MP3 player. Worked great. Wanted water resistant unit for marine environment where sea salt is a problem. Time will tell about how well the aluminum speakers hold up to the sea salt. Cut strip of closed cell foam, rolled up, put into the channel where a power tool battery would be insert to keep salt out when using ac adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Cool radio, but has design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The size, weight, durability, rechargeable battery, and the iphone plug in all attracted me to this radio. I am however very dissatisfied with the volume of sound that this puts out. Any loud sounds seem to mute this radio while standing more than 15 feet away. I work in a fairly noisy environment and this radio just isn't up to snuff. Also, I can't fit my iphone in the tiny phone holder thing, and my phone is not that big!! Unless you are a painter I would not consider this a jobsite radio.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sounds good. gets pretty warm around power input, will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: john c bazarian

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: My husband is elated! He loves this radio. It is small and has great reception!
customer_reviews.author: lana penney

customer_reviews.title: Works well, isn't very loud when my phoneis plugged ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, isn't very loud when my phoneis plugged in. And yes volume on my phone is all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Shua

customer_reviews.title: I found a great present for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this radio and now is buying the "tools only" tools by Milwaukee. Great Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Salyers

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the way this item was sold.
customer_reviews.text: This item was sold, minus battery & charger. I went elsewhere to buy the battery & charger. I am a prime member and was unhappy to be charged up to $13.00 for shipping through Amazon. I would have prefered to pay a higher price that included battery & charger. This is the only time I have been dissatisfied with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S Bigham

customer_reviews.title: great radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio is very durable. The sound quality and volume are great. I purchased this because it was much smaller and lighter than other jobsite radios. The ipod case is a great feature. I would recommend the extended 12v battery pack if you plan on using an ipod. It lasts all day for me. The normal battery doesn't last very long (less than 3 hours).
customer_reviews.author: pmac425

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee radio
customer_reviews.text: The perfect radio for the older contractor who doesn't want to carry around the large radio. This radio picks up all the radio stations in our area and the sound is great
customer_reviews.author: zuck

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy that I received the radio so quickly
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy that I received the radio so quickly.The radio has great sound, and is well made. The only bad thing, is the size of the plug, it's big and awkward to plug in.
customer_reviews.author: LORRAINE H.

customer_reviews.title: the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: This met and exceeded all expectations for a gift,my friend,a construction worker in isolated areas says"this is a Godsend".It never fails,the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: carol a pascale

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee 2590-20 M12 Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio, it sound better than some of the other job site radios three times it's size. The only thing I would change, is have the ipod charge while its pluged to the radio
customer_reviews.author: D. D.

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mechanic in a bodyshop. Pretty loud in there, constant grinding and air hammering across the shop. I keep this on my cart and it is plenty loud. Battery lasts me about 3-4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: LeroyPTLC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: got it for my husband, he had a Milwaukee radio at work and wanted a second one for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: keila savage

customer_reviews.title: small package good sound
customer_reviews.text: sized right . The sound is pretty good but don't expect the volume of those full size radios . The only con is the battery only lasts about 2 to 3 hours and the radio doesn't charge the battery when plugged in . Maybe I set my hopes to high . For a radio for the deck in your backyard , nice . Jobsite radio for work . NAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Not on regular construction sites . Maybe your more quiet ones
customer_reviews.author: Sikuvjunk

customer_reviews.title: what's not to like? Well
customer_reviews.text: Really, what's not to like? Well, the item does have a rechargeable battery that is not included and I would have ordered it with the unit had I known. Maybe I didn't read close enough but it would be a good idea to just include that battery with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee's best radio
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a small work site radio with 10 AM and 10 FM presets. Works well with my I-pod.
customer_reviews.author: al j.

customer_reviews.title: won't hold an iPhone
customer_reviews.text: the sound is impressive, but the compartment for the "music device" is way too small. Don't expect to get your iPhone 5 or anything bigger into that cubby. I kept it because of the price and the sound, but now I'm buying an iPod nano to fit in the compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome jobsite radio. The sound is excellent, it's much lighter than previous models and is smaller in size. The I-pod dock is a great addition to the previous model too. My husband is working on an army base in Afghanistan and I sent this to him. He and all the other guys there just love this radio! They say it makes there time so much more bearable. I have a feeling there will be lots of these being requested for Christmas gifts this year!
customer_reviews.author: nancy joyce

customer_reviews.title: Not a very well made radio with short warranty
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a little over a year. And unbeknownst to me radios only have a 1 year warranty. I have over 3000 in Milwaukee 18v and electric tools. Love there stuff, this wasn't a well made radio.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Acquafreda

customer_reviews.title: good sound, not a long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio for use in my postal vehicle. The size is perfect and I can get a lot of stations with quality sound. The "mute" button is a great feature, rather than turning sound down, the presets are handy also. I use it approximately 3.5 hrs a day and have to recharge the battery after every use to make it through 2 days (7hrs). After trying a regular boom box, this radio has better sound and is built to last.
customer_reviews.author: C. Travaille

customer_reviews.title: little giant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio to replace a portable I used in my work truck. Its all they say it is,great sound,easy access to controls and sturdy. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: but good radio at home
customer_reviews.text: Not Loa us enough, but good radio at home, plays well
customer_reviews.author: Patty Lamoureux

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee 2590 m12
customer_reviews.text: Although this radio looks really nice, I am completely disappointed on two levels. I listen to AM radio and it is very sensitive directionally. I move a lot on a golf cart while working and the signal fades unless positioned just so. Also, the battery life is very disappointing. Seems like about 4 hours per battery. that is not satisfactory. I think I wasted my money. Oh, when it is performing as it should-it does have good sound.
customer_reviews.author: quinton tschetter

customer_reviews.title: Small disappointment was that it didn't come with a battery (which ...
customer_reviews.text: Small disappointment was that it didn't come with a battery (which we had to special order). Other than that we loved it.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Was not loud at all returned this item i no it has been receive but I have not been issued a refund
customer_reviews.author: MS BEAUTIFUL

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: dropped it 3 feet, and the led screen / digital screen shattered.. its not protected at all. sound is fine though
customer_reviews.author: Sgt On the Shore

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but way small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a christmas gift. It's really nice but he has an M18 charger so it didn't work. We had to return it. It was also really small. I would spend the extra money and go with the bigger one. By the way, I had no idea Amazon doesn't do free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Girl

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee M12 Radio
customer_reviews.text: I like this radio but I don't love it. I really want to purchase a new better one. I need one that brings in AM very well for sports and talk shows. I am so spoiled by XM in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Rosslyn Stone

customer_reviews.title: great little radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little radio. We live in a 'dead zone' for reception, but this radio has pulled stations that we couldn't get before. My husband uses it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Skiier

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little more sound to come out of this radio. The large transformer on the cord is annoying too as it cannot be directly plugged into an exterior outlet. You have to run it off of an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: mongulus

customer_reviews.title: hoping for cordless
customer_reviews.text: the radio is fine and dandy but i didn't know i had to buy a battery that fits like a power drill to have cordless fun. sad day but everything else is good :)
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea freeland

customer_reviews.title: Skip this raido! Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this raido! The sound is poor! I tested the sound against my alarm clock and my clock won hands down! For 117.00 I expected it to charge my batteries..... It won't even accept my new batteries! I'll be shipping this thing back and spending the extra 30.00 on the Dewalt! Less than a zero star rating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pearson

customer_reviews.title: REPLACEMENT RADIO
customer_reviews.text: My last Milwaukee radio, it was a little bigger and had the roll bar handles was stolen, so I bought this one a replacement. It's not near the radio my last one was.
customer_reviews.author: chelanman

customer_reviews.title: Great portable and tough radio
customer_reviews.text: My dad has one of these and we bought it for my father in law for Christmas. Great that the battery can be charged. Good for listening to while in the woods cutting wood.
customer_reviews.author: curlygirltf

customer_reviews.title: buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio great sound very loud for a compact radio going to buy a second one in the future awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Music Only
customer_reviews.text: Great, strong, clear sound and will fit in large tool bag. However, unit does not charge M12 batteries, nor does it charge the iPod.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: i
customer_reviews.text: I Thought i was buying the bigger radio(20 INCH MODEL) I would never pay 100.00 for this bitty thing!)
customer_reviews.author: Kirk F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: was not aware the radio CANNOT charge the battery...that s*cks
customer_reviews.author: Pow Build 33

customer_reviews.title: beaterman
customer_reviews.text: Good qualiy light weight and portable... I would expect that a c-d player drive would be nice where radio signal is weak..Over all the sound was on the tinny side.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M. rome

customer_reviews.title: We loved this radio but left it out in the rain ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved this radio but left it out in the rain one time and it stopped working. Very disappointed. I bought it because it was weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't decided what to do with this radio yet but I am getting very disappointed in Amazon and the quality of it's products lat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. The plant I work at is out the boonies so I thought I could get more that one station with this radio. I was wrong. I could only get one station to come in. I started using the CD player and wouldn't you know it quit working after 6 wks. I only used it a work for 2-3 hrs a day. CD just spins, won't play. Haven't decided what to do with this radio yet but I am getting very disappointed in Amazon and the quality of it's products lately. I've thrown more away than I have kept. The reviews do not seem help either. This radio had great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: birdman1999

product_meta.title: Milwaukee M12 Cordless Job-Site Radio 2590-20 (Tool Only)
product_meta.description:
M12 cordless Lithium-Ion radio, exclusive digital processor, premium weatherproof aluminum speakers, weather sealed MP3 compartment, shock absorbing ABS polymer housing, ultraslim size, powered by M12 Red Lithium battery packs or AC adaptor, includes: auxiliary input cord, AC adaptor, 2 "AAA" batteries, M12 Red Lithium battery and charger sold separately, for replacement battery use TV #111-527.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The M12 radio is the first job site radio with an exclusive digital tuner that delivers highest reception accuracy and signal clarity for both AM and FM bands as well as being iPod and MP3 compatible.
feature_bullets: M12 radio is equipped with premium weatherproof aluminum speakers
Contains a weather sealed MP3 compartment
The M12 radio is only 10 1/2-inch narrow, 3.5 lbs, and is powered by M12 lithium-ion battery pack or AC adaptor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars236 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
